about.title: Hi, My name's Job. I'm a  student at Kasetsart University degree of Software and Knowledge Engineering, interested in web-development and i love to learn new thing
about.address: 196 Soi Samukkee34 Thasai Mhuang Nonthaburi 11000 Thailand

projects.name: Shoot A Ghost
projects.description: This is my final project for the Individual Software Development Process course. It is a 2D shooter with the goal of shooting the ghost before it enter it's escape portal

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: This is my midterm project for Software Specification & Design course. It is a game of marking an x or o in a 3x3 table for two players, The game will win when the player can check in vertical. Horizontal or diagonal

projects.name: Pokemon Volley Ball
projects.description: This is my fianl project for Software Specification & Design course, It is a game of volley ball for 2 players who make the ball fall to the other side to get points if anyone points to 10 will winning

projects.name: Wallet App
projects.description: This is my final project for Software Specification & Design course, It is an Android Application that is used to record our income, money and balance

projects.name: Incident Software
projects.description: This is website for works with hardware to display the amount of water left in the garden. And in real time, the graph of soil moisture and light density, The temperature is displayed in real time. You can also set time for watering in the garden

projects.name: What The Fast
projects.description: This is my final project for Data Comunication Skills course, This's a website that checks the speed of the Internet, displays ping, ip address, download, upload, and server using checks

projects.name: Facelespedia
projects.description: This is my final project for Database  course. This's a website for provides statistics on the players and the hero of the game Dota2

projects.name: exceed vote frontend
projects.description: The frontend website for the votes of the camp Exceed 14

projects.name: Medicon App (Cycle1)
projects.description: The website for counseling, Treatment advice for those who think that there is a problem and want to consult with a psychiatrist
projects.tags: Ruby on Rails, SASS, Slim, jQuery

projects.name: Getkaset (Cycle1)
projects.description: The website for e-Commerce, Selling agricultural products. There is a section of the question - answer the article and have members systems, trading systems and parts of the product management

projects.name: Coup Web
projects.description: This is my final project for Workgroup Software Development Process course. The website for e-Commerce, Selling clothing and accessories of women with Membership system, Trading systems and Admin system
